lines: 1. Bachenu more n'oboros'obuyaase okwegena ring'ana riaye;Nkiaratebe Kebuet'egiatebete,Ning'onagotamera Omotoria?Ning'onagotamera Omotoria?
2. Timoiroka ninde amo nainwe,Naki Ninche Nyasae orabatorie;Nkoe 'nguru, ngotorie, ngotenenie,nkobwate n'okoboko gwe chinguru,Nkobwate nokoboko gwe chinguru.
3. Kondakorangerie korw' as'amache,Ndoche chi'obororo nchigokobua;Naki nimbe naye kogosesenia,Na kogochena korw'as'emechandoNa kogochena kortv'as'emechando.
4. Nonya kogoet'emechand'emenge,Obuya bwane obonge mboisaine;'Morerb' omong'orakobue,Nayobekir'ogochen' ogosibie'Nayobekir'ogochen' ogosibie.
5. Nkoro etimogete ase Yeso,Tinkoyetig'egend'as'ababisa;Nkor'eyio amakweri nayenyegeria,Tinkoyetiga yaya tinkoyetiga,Tinkoyetiga yaya tinkoyetiga.
